column4: ok I have installed nvidia drivefrs for my fx5200...   and played with nvidia-settings... how do I configure my card to mirror image on both outputs (or even better to send the output of mplayer to the second monitor only)?
if you want it to do a mirror, just use Option   "TwinViewOrientation" "Clone" in  your xorg.conf
